servinfo.title: Optical axes of both headlights do not change

condition.ptxt: Optical axes of both headlights do not change

action.ptxt: Replace fuse and check for short circuit.

ps.ptxt: Supply voltage too low or too high

action.ptxt: Check charging system referring to Generator Test (Undercharged Battery Check):For Petrol Engine Model / Generator Test (Undercharged Battery Check):For Diesel Engine Model or Generator Test (Overcharged Battery Check):For Petrol Engine Model / Generator Test (Overcharged Battery Check):For Diesel Engine Model .
Check headlight leveling control module for function referring to Inspection of Headlight Leveling Control Module and Its Circuit (Vehicle Equipped With Auto Leveling Headlight System) .
